group.title: UW Undergraduate Students
group.desc: UW students who are identified as undergraduates. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 1 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Graduate Students
group.desc: UW students who are identified as graduate students, including professional degree programs (Dentistry, Law, Medicine, etc.) and approved on-leave graduate students. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 2 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Graduate Students - Current
group.desc: UW students who are identified as graduate students for the current quarter only, including approved on-leave graduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 2 and c.status_code = 1 JOIN verify sdb_status on sdb_status.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_status.verify_code = 127 and sdb_status.source_code = 2 and sdb_status.verify_data in ('E','L') ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Graduate Students - Graduate
group.desc: UW students who are identified as graduate students, including approved on-leave graduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 2 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_class on sdb_class.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_class.verify_code = 126 and sdb_class.source_code = 2 and sdb_class.verify_data = '08' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Current Seattle students
group.desc: A group containing all current students whose primary campus is identified as Seattle. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code in (1,2,18,19) and c.status_code = 1 JOIN verify sdb_status on sdb_status.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_status.verify_code = 127 and sdb_status.source_code = 2 and sdb_status.verify_data = 'E' JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '0' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Seattle Undergraduate Students
group.desc: UW Seattle students who are identified as undergraduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 1 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '0' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Seattle Graduate Students
group.desc: UW Seattle students who are identified as graduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 2 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '0' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Current Bothell students
group.desc: A group containing all current students whose primary campus is identified as Bothell. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code in (1,2,18,19) and c.status_code = 1 JOIN verify sdb_status on sdb_status.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_status.verify_code = 127 and sdb_status.source_code = 2 and sdb_status.verify_data = 'E' JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '1' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Bothell Undergraduate Students
group.desc: UW Bothell students who are identified as undergraduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 1 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '1' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Bothell Graduate Students
group.desc: UW Bothell students who are identified as graduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 2 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '1' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Current Tacoma students
group.desc: A group containing all current students whose primary campus is identified as Tacoma. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code in (1,2,18,19) and c.status_code = 1 JOIN verify sdb_status on sdb_status.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_status.verify_code = 127 and sdb_status.source_code = 2 and sdb_status.verify_data = 'E' JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '2' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Tacoma Undergraduate Students
group.desc: UW Tacoma students who are identified as undergraduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 1 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '2' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Tacoma Graduate Students
group.desc: UW Tacoma students who are identified as graduate students. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 2 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify sdb_branch on sdb_branch.validation_id = u.validation_id and sdb_branch.verify_code = 128 and sdb_branch.source_code = 2 and sdb_branch.verify_data = '2' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Medicine Workforce Members
group.desc: Members of the UW Medicine Workforce that use clinical applications as identified by UW Medicine IT Services User Access Administration (uaa@u.washington.edu). This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 13 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Staff Employees
group.desc: UW staff. Excludes student employee appointments. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a two week grace period for recent terminees.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code in (4,288) and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Student Employees
group.desc: UW student employees. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a two week grace period for recent terminees.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 14 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Affiliate Employees
group.desc: Contingent Workers in Workday. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a two week grace period for recent terminees.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 15 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Alumni
group.desc: Alumni of the UW. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 16 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Medicine Non-Workforce
group.desc: UW Medicine Non-Workforce that use clinical applications as identified by UW Medicine IT Services User Access Administration (uaa@u.washington.edu). This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 17 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Extension Students
group.desc: Students who are in the Professional & Continuing Education program. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code in (18,19) and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Applicants
group.desc: Applicants for admission to the UW. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recent applicants.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 20 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Cascadia Community College Members
group.desc: Employees and students of Cascadia Community College. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students and employees.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 41 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Cascadia Community College Students
group.desc: Students of Cascadia Community College. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 41 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify cascadia_dept on cascadia_dept.validation_id=u.validation_id and cascadia_dept.verify_code = 117 and cascadia_dept.source_code = 8 and cascadia_dept.verify_data = 'STU' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Cascadia Community College Employees
group.desc: Employees of Cascadia Community College. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recent employees.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 41 and c.status_code != 3 JOIN verify cascadia_dept on cascadia_dept.validation_id=u.validation_id and cascadia_dept.verify_code = 117 and cascadia_dept.source_code = 8 and cascadia_dept.verify_data = 'EMP' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Seattle Cancer Care Alliance Employees
group.desc: Employees of Seattle Cancer Care Alliance. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 53 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Seattle Cancer Care Alliance Affiliates
group.desc: Affiliates of Seattle Cancer Care Alliance. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 54 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center Employees
group.gname: Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center Employees
group.desc: Employees of Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 55 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center Affiliates
group.gname: Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center Affiliates
group.desc: Affiliates of Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 56 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: HEAL-WA
group.desc: Licensed Healthcare providers who are subscribed to HEAL-WA library resources. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a two week grace period for recently licensed providers.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 57 and c.status_code != 3 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Alumni Association Members
group.desc: Paying members of the UW Alumni Association. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN validation v on u.validation_id = v.validation_id and v.source_code = 7 and v.status_code = 1 and u.status_code = 30 JOIN verify alumni_member on alumni_member.validation_id = v.validation_id and alumni_member.verify_code = 130 and alumni_member.source_code = v.source_code and alumni_member.verify_data = 'A' ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Current WWAMI area Medical Residents
group.desc: A group containing medical residents in FMRN and Spokane Internal Medicine programs who are eligible for employee computing services and UW Libraries system. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a short grace period for recently enrolled residents.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 145 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: My UW Giving Sponsored
group.desc: A group containing UW NetIDs created through the My UW Giving registration process. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 153 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Physicians Providers
group.desc: This group contains UW Physicians Provider members. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 76 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Continuum College Undergraduate Students
group.desc: Students who are enrolled with the Continuum College and have SDB class levels of 01, 02, 03, 04 or 05. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and c.category_code in (18,19) and u.status_code=30 and c.source_code=2 JOIN verify class ON class.validation_id = u.validation_id and class.verify_code = 126 and class.source_code = c.source_code and class.instance = 1 WHERE c.status_code!=3 AND class.verify_data in ('01','02','03','04','05') ORDER BY u.uwnetid;

group.title: UW Continuum College Graduate Students
group.desc: Students who are enrolled with the Continuum College and have SDB class levels of 08, 11, 12, 13 or 14. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data. Includes a grace period for recently enrolled students.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on c.validation_id = u.validation_id and c.category_code in (18,19) and u.status_code=30 and c.source_code=2 JOIN verify class ON class.validation_id = u.validation_id and class.verify_code = 126 and class.source_code = c.source_code and class.instance = 1 WHERE c.status_code!=3 AND class.verify_data in ('08','11','12','13','14') ORDER BY u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs managed by UW Medicine
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs managed by UW Medicine
group.desc: Active Clinical Shared UW NetIDs. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 22 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs managed by UW Medicine no-service
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs managed by UW Medicine no-service
group.desc: Active Clinical Shared UW NetIDs marked as not eligible for UW NetID services like @uw.edu email. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 23 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Course
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Course
group.desc: Active Course Shared UW NetIDs. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 12 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Departmental
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Departmental
group.desc: Active Departmental Shared UW NetIDs. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 11 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as No-Service
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as No-Service
group.desc: Active No-Service Shared UW NetIDs. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 24 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Student Activity Office accounts
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Student Activity Office accounts
group.desc: Active SAO RSO Shared UW NetIDs. Includes Shared UW NetIDs affiliated with Bothell, Seattle, or Tacoma. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 21 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Support Organization
group.gname: Shared UW NetIDs categorized as Support Organization
group.desc: Active Support Organization Shared UW NetIDs. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 69 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;

group.title: Admin UW NetIDs
group.desc: Active Admin UW NetIDs. This group is automatically maintained in near-real time from UW-IT Identity Registry data.
group.query: SELECT distinct u.uwnetid FROM uwnetid u JOIN category c on u.validation_id = c.validation_id and u.status_code = 30 and c.category_code = 46 and c.status_code = 1 ORDER by u.uwnetid;
